text: So inn dono ko fareb say neechay le aaya pus inn dono ney jab darakht ko chakha dono ki sharamgahen aik doosray kay roo baroo bey parda hogayen aur dono apney upper jannat kay pattay jor jor ker rakhne lagay aur inn kay rab ney inn ko pukara mein tum dono ko iss darakht say mana nahi ker chuka tha aur yeh na keh chuka kay shetan tumhara sareeh dushman hai
